name: Fretboard Learning
description:
Fretboard learning is a true guitar companion. It offers the best educational games to learn the notes on your guitar.

In this app you'll find:
- Learn the fretboard playing the differents games
- Practice your musical ear
- Learn more than 500 chords all over the fretboard
- Learn all scales in all the differents boxes
- Customize your experience by selecting your favorite tuning or create your own
- Left handed mode
- Différent notes notation
- Circle of fifths: an interactive and fun tool to explore music harmony
- Metronome
- Statistics of your current steak
- A detailed heat map of the fretboard
- A global heat map of the fretboard
